Functional requirements

Non-functional requirements

Minimisation number of queries on stock data provider

Descripion
Queries about the real-time state of indices shall be made only from one central location. [Rationale] Making queries from only one central point eases configuration and maintenance of connections to external stock data providers. Limiting number of queries reduces load on external services, which can be limited by contract with stock data provider.

Client interaction as a web application

Descripion
End users shall communicate with the system via web interface [Rationale] Web interfaces do not requiere to be installed on end user machines, which improves maintainability.

Client web application must be compatible with modern browsers

Descripion
Client application shall rremain functionally equivalent under Firefox 4+, MSIE 9+. Chrome 12+. [Rationale] ...
